claim: Laura Linney was nominated for Tony Awards for The Crucible, Sight Unseen, Time Stands Still, and The Little Foxes.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Linney made her Broadway debut in 1990 , before going on to receive Tony Award nominations for the 2002 revival of The Crucible , the original Broadway productions of Sight Unseen  (  2004  )  and Time Stands Still  (  2010  )  , as well as the 2017 revival of The Little Foxes .
